questions.question: SIMILAR TO A CELL PHONE OR SMART WATCH, THE ATTRACTION CARS CHARGE THEIR BATTERIES USING THIS METHOD.
AT 440 FEET ACROSS AT ITS WIDEST POINT AND 290 FEET FRONT TO BACK, THE BUILDING WHEN VIEWED FROM ABOVE INCLUDING THE FOUNTAIN AREA FORM THIS SHAPE.
THROUGHOUT PLANNING, THE PAVILION STAYED IN THE SAME LOCATION FACING THIS CARDINAL DIRECTION BECAUSE OF ITS SOLAR PANELS.
UPON ENTERING, GUESTS CAN SEE THE A REPRESENTATION OF THE SUN'S RADIATING ENERGY AND THE EARTH IN THIS BUILDING FEATURE.
"ENERGY EXCHANGE", THE PAVILION'S POST SHOW WITH HANDS-ON DISPLAYS, WAS LOCATED IN THIS BUILDING.
THE PRE-SHOW "LIVING" CINEMA SCENE HAD 100 OF THESE WHICH WERE TRIANGULAR SHAPED AND SPUN ON AN AXIS.
THIS COMPANY SPONSORED THE ENTIRE ORIGINAL RUN OF THE ATTRACTION AND THE UPDATED VERSION UNTIL 2004.
THE DINOSAUR DIORAMA INCLUDED A GROUP OF ORNITHOMIMUS WATCHING AS ONE SANK INTO ONE OF THESE.
DUE TO THE DELAYS IN TEST TRACK, IT OPENED TEMPORARILY DURING ITS OWN UPDATE IN THIS YEAR.
THIS CZECH FILM MAKER DEVELOPED THE COMPUTER CONTROLLED "DIAOLYEKTAN" IN THE PRE-SHOW.
THIS ACTOR WHO PLAYED COSMO KRAMER ON "SEINFELD" MAKES A CAMEO AS A CAVEMAN.
ON THE KNRG RADIO, THIS RECENTLY RETIRED ESPN PERSONALITY BROADCASTS HIS SIGNATURE "BACK, BACK, BACK, BACK, BACK...".
THE ELLEN ANIMATRONIC WAS AN EXAMPLE OF THIS MODEL.
FOR A VERY BRIEF TIME, THIS WAS THE ORIGINAL NAME OF THE ATTRACTION AFTER ITS MAJOR RENOVATION.
THE THEORETICAL MAXIMUM AMOUNT THAT COULD HAVE BEEN WON IN THE DOUBLE JEOPARDY ROUND, THIS WAS ELLEN'S FINAL SCORE.
GETTING MILLIONS OF TONS LIGHTER EVERY SECOND, IT SUPPLIES MOST OF THE ENERGY THE EARTH RECEIVES.
THE ENERGY WE CALL SUNSHINE IS INITIALLY GENERATED BY THE SUN'S FUSION OF HYDROGEN INTO THIS.
TEXAS TECH HAS A DEPARTMENT DEVOTED TO THIS ENGINEERING BRANCH THAT FOCUSES ON THE EXPLOITATION OF OIL & GAS RESERVES
ABBREVIATED PV, THESE TYPE OF SOLAR POWER CELLS CONVERT SUNLIGHT INTO ELECTRIC ENERGY.
THE MOST ABUNDANT & MOST WIDELY USED TYPE OF COAL, IT'S ALSO CALLED "SOFT COAL"
"ELLEN, ENERGY’S THE MOST IMPORTANT THING IN… ___!" (2)
"THE PIGGY BANK?" "NO, THE BIG BANG." "___?" (3)
"THAT’S GREAT, BILL, BUT WE STILL NEED A HECK OF A LOT MORE ENERGY. WHERE IS IT COMING FROM, AND DO YOU HAVE A ___?" (2)
"JUDY HAS A COMMANDING LEAD; ELLEN HAS HER WORK CUT OUT FOR HER; AND DR. EINSTEIN IS NOWHERE — ___." (2)
"SOME CONTESTANTS ON JEOPARDY WILL RECEIVE A YEAR’S SUPPLY OF ENERGY. ENERGY - ___!" (5)
questions.answer: What is "you make the world go round"?

questions.question: ALSO IN EPCOT, MANY PEOPLE HAVE BEEN KNOWN TO TAKE A NAP IN THIS 45 MINUTE SHOW.
THIS ATTRACTION GOES UNDER REFURBISHMENT EVERY FOUR OR EIGHT YEARS.
questions.answer: What is the Hall of Presidents?

questions.question: YOU CAN FALL ASLEEP IN THIS ROTATING ATTRACTION AND WAKE UP IN A DIFFERENT TIME.
questions.answer: What is Walt Disney's Carousel of Progress?

questions.question: USUALLY HAVING NO LINE, YOU CAN SLEEP ON THIS RIDE SPONSORED BY ALAMO.
CAST MEMBERS HAVE BEEN KNOWN TO FALL ASLEEP ON THE WALL FOR THIS ATTRACTION SHOW AND WAKE UP FROM THE EXPLOSIONS AT THE END.
SHORTLY AFTER ITS OPENING, THIS PARK PITCHED THE IDEA OF A PAVILION ABOUT MOVIES, THE GENESIS OF THE GREAT MOVIE RIDE.
THIS NEWLY ASSIGNED DISNEY CEO AND MARTY SKLAR DECIDED THE IDEA WAS STRONG ENOUGH FOR AN ENTIRE PARK.
ONE OF THE SPIRES ON TOP OF THE THEATER RETRACTED SO NOT TO BLOCK MICKEY MOUSE FOR THIS NIGHTTIME SHOW.
questions.answer: What is Sorcery in the Sky?

questions.question: THE DATE IT OPENED.
THIS WAS THE ORIGINAL TITLE FOR WHAT WOULD BECOME THE GREAT MOVIE RIDE.
questions.answer: What is"Great Moments at the Movies"?

questions.question: THE SAME YEAR AS THE ORIGINAL CHINESE THEATER OPENED, THIS IS HOW LONG THE TRACK IS.
THE CARS ARE A SIMPLIFIED VERSION OF THOSE IN THIS ATTRACTION, BUT ALLOWING THE DRIVER TO CONTROL ITS SPEED.
A NOD TO OTHER GEORGE LUCAS FILMS, THESE TWO CHARACTERS CAN BE FOUND IN THE INDIANA JONES SCENE.
THE BINARY CODE IN ALIEN IS ACTUALLY THE CODE FOR THIS CHARACTER.
questions.answer: What is the Wicked Witch of the West?

questions.question: BOTTLE CAPS WERE USED AS KNOBS ON THE SPACESUITS IN REFERENCE TO THIS ORIGINAL CORPORATE SPONSOR.
"IT'S THE PERFECT JOB FOR ME BECAUSE ___." (3)
"THIS IS 'ALIEN'. YOU ARE WITH SIGOURNEY WEAVER ABOARD THE SPACESHIP NOSTROMO. ___." (4)
"SORRY ABOUT THE DELAY, FOLKS, BUT I DON'T WANT TO ___, EVEN IF IT IS JUST A MOVIE." (4)
"OH, RUBBISH, ___. BE GONE BEFORE SOMEONE DROPS A HOUSE ON YOU, TOO." (5)
questions.answer: What is "you have no power here"?

questions.question: "HALT, UNBELIEVER! DISTURB THE TREASURE OF THE GODS, AND YOU SHALL ALL ? ___?" (4)
NEWLY ORDAINED DISNEY LEGEND WHOOPI GOLDBERG IS SEEN IN THE MONTAGE ROCKING THE HOUSE IN THIS MOVIE.
PLANNED TO BE SHOWN IN SILHOUETTE FORM IN THE ORIGINAL ENDING, THIS GENERAL CAN BE SEEN IN A CLIP IN THE SAME ICONIC SALUTE.
THE CLIP FROM THIS MOVIE SHOWS EDDIE MURPHY ASKING, "IS THERE A PROBLEM, OFFICERS?".
THIS IS THE ONLY MOVIE IN THE MONTAGE IN WHICH ITS TITLE IS SAID.
PAST AND PRESENT, THIS IS HOW MANY STAR WARS MOVIES HAVE HAD CLIPS SHOWN IN THE MONTAGE.
questions.answer: What is three (A New Hope, Return of the Jedi, and The Force Awakens)?

questions.question: THIS IS THE ONLY DISNEY MOVIE REPRESENTED WITH AUDIO ANIMATRONICS IN THE ATTRACTION.
THE CAGNEY FAMILY DONATED THIS ARTICLE OF CLOTHING FOR JAMES'S ANIMATRONIC FIGURE.
HE'S THE PARTNER OF KATE DURANGO AND KIDD CARSON WHO'S A LITTLE SLOW WHEN IT COMES TO LEARNIN'.
THE INDIANA JONES SCENE TAKES PLACE AT THE ALTAR OF THIS EGYPTIAN GOD.
THIS IS THE OLDEST MOVIE FEATURED AS A PHYSICAL SCENE ON THE ATTRACTION.

double-jeopardy.name: LET'S JUST PUT HANDS IN IT

questions.question: HE SIGNED HIS CEMENT WITH "MAY THE FORCE BE WITH YOU."
THIS FAMOUS PROP FROM "THE WIZARD OF OZ" HAS ITS OWN CEMENT BLOCK OUTSIDE OF THE ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What are the ruby red slippers?

questions.question: THESE TWO THREE-NAMED CELEBRITIES ARE NEXT TO EACH OTHER AND BOTH APPEARED ON THE SHOW NAMED AFTER ONE OF THEM
questions.answer: Who are Dick Van Dyke and Mary Tyler Moore?

questions.question: IMPRINTED IN THIS ACTOR'S CEMENT IS HIS SIGNATURE HAND GESTURE, WHICH HE FIRST SAW A RABBI USE AS A KID IN A SYNAGOGE AND IS NOW AN EMOJI.
THIS "HAWKEYE" DECIDED TO PIERCE HIS NOSE IN THE CORNER OF THE CEMENT!

final-jeopardy.question: THIS IS THE ONE SOURCE OF POWER THAT WILL NEVER RUN OUT.
